metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25690 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds write flaw was found in FontForge in versions before20200314 while parsing SFD files containing certain LayerCount tokens. Thisflaw allows an attacker to manipulate the memory allocated on the heap,causing the application to crash or execute arbitrary code. The highestthreat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality, integrity, as well assystem availability.

criterions.comment: fontforge package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
